name: com.ryxali.fsmforunity
description: Fsm For Unity is a solution to build finite state machines in C#, accompanied with a visual debugger.

samples.description: A sample that moves between two states periodically, outputting PING/PONG.
A sample that moves between two states periodically using a coroutine state, outputting PING/PONG.
A sample that presents how one might implement UI behaviour with state machines, like a main menu.
A sample world with a player and an AI agent, where the AI responds to the player's movement using a state machine.
